title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4125/87 of 21 December 1987 fixing the guaranteed minimum price for Atlantic sardines
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 4125/87
of 21 December 1987
fixing the guaranteed minimum price for Atlantic sardines
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The guaranteed minimum provided for in Article 2 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3117/85 shall be as follows for the 1988 fishing year:
(in Ecu/tonne)
1,3 //  // Whole fish 1.2.3 //  //  //  // Size   // Extra, A   // B   //    //   //   // 1   // 248   // 158   // 2   // 248   // 158   // 3   // 384   // 158   // 4   // 248   // 158  //    //   //
The freshness, size and presentation categories shall be those defined pursuant to Article 2 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3796/81 (3).

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1987.
For the Commission
Antรณnio CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 297, 9. 11. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 355, 17. 12. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
